original_text: And they did eat and drink, he and the men that were with him, and tarried all night; and they rose up in the morning, and he said, Send me away unto my master.
korean_text: 이에 그들 곧 종과 동행자들이 먹고 마시고 유숙하고 아침에 일어나서 그가 이르되 나를 보내어 내 주인에게로 돌아가게 하소서

sentences.original_text: And they did eat and drink,
he and the men that were with him,
and they rose up in the morning,
Send me away unto my master.
